findings.title: Add `` OwnershipTransferred `` event
findings.description: There is no `` OwnershipTransferred `` event in Ownable contract, it would be better if you will add it.

findings.title: Add zero address checking
findings.description: There is no zero address checking in functions 'transfer' and 'mint'. It would be better to check for zero address, for preventing users from losing their funds.

findings.title: Add `` Transfer `` event
findings.description: Please add a `` Transfer `` event inside your `` constructor `` after adding all the total supply to the `` msg.sender `` account.
